trans:
ğŸ”» Evacuate as early as possible during torrential rains, landslides, and mudslides if you live in a flat, hilly area or near a river.
ğŸ”» Have your radios, flashlights, first aid kits, drinking water, food, and other essential supplies readily available at home.
ğŸ”» Repair all doors and windows of the house, take the potted plants indoors, and stake in place to uphold and protect from the strong winds the blowable trees and plants.
ğŸ”» Check on the construction fences, scaffolding, billboards, and advertisements. Either take down or secure to prevent them from being blown down and causing harm.
ğŸ”» In the event you receive a notice of municipal evacuation, please cooperate with city personnel in effecting the evacuation measures.
